results.title: Metformin attenuates pressure overload-induced cardiac hypertrophy via AMPK activation.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ attenuates @<m>DISEASE_Iron_Overload</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019190 @@@pressure overload@@@-induced @DISEASE_Cardiomegaly @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@ via AMPK activation.

citations.NLM: Fu YN, Xiao H, Ma XW, Jiang SY, Xu M, Zhang YY. Metformin attenuates pressure overload-induced cardiac hypertrophy via AMPK activation. Acta Pharmacol Sin. 2011 Jul;32(7):879-87. PMID: 21552292

results.title: Metformin attenuates cardiac fibrosis by inhibiting the TGFbeta1-Smad3 signalling pathway.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ inhibited @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@cardiac fibrosis@@@ induced by @<m>DISEASE_Iron_Overload</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019190 @@@pressure overload@@@ in vivo and inhibited collagen synthesis in CFs probably via inhibition of the @GENE_TGFB1 @GENE_21803 @@@TGF-beta(1)@@@-@GENE_SMAD3 @GENE_17127 @@@Smad3@@@ signalling pathway.

citations.NLM: Xiao H, Ma X, Feng W, Fu Y, Lu Z, Xu M, Shen Q, Zhu Y, Zhang Y. Metformin attenuates cardiac fibrosis by inhibiting the TGFbeta1-Smad3 signalling pathway. Cardiovasc Res. 2010 Aug 1;87(3):504-13. PMID: 20200042

results.title: Activation of AMP-activated protein kinase inhibits albumin-induced endoplasmic reticulum stress and apoptosis through inhibition of reactive oxygen species.
results.text_hl: Our in vivo animal study showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ reduced the renal cortical expression of ER stress protein (@GENE_HSPA5 @GENE_25617 @@@GRP78@@@) in @<m>DISEASE_Iron_Overload</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019190 @@@protein-overload@@@ @DISEASE_Proteinuria @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: Fructose surges damage hepatic adenosyl-monophosphate-dependent kinase and lead to increased lipogenesis and hepatic insulin resistance.
results.text_hl: ., more momentum to find new and improved carbonyl quenchers, new insights on the action of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, more evidence for the role of @GENE_GAPDH @GENE_2597 @@@GAPDH@@@ inactivation due to @<m>DISEASE_Iron_Overload</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019190 @@@mitochondrial overload@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Complications @DISEASE_MESH:D048909 @@@diabetes complications@@@.
